Headline: Linden- bound Purple Line Service Delayed  at Howard
ShortDescription: Linden- bound Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to a sick rider. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden- bound Purple Line trains are standing at Howard due to a sick rider.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute near Central/Lake
ShortDescription: #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity near Central/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity near Central/Lake.

Southbound buses will operate via Central, Chicago, Laramie, Lake, then resume their normal route on Central.

Northbound buses will operate via Central, Corcoran, Laramie, Chicago,  Lake, then resume their normal route on Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Berteau
ShortDescription: #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

Allow extra travel time.
